content:
crochet instructions for single-color star and tree and a two-colored snowflake ornaments range in size from 3-3 5 / 7 6-9 cm yarn requirements
ca 1 ball
cb 1 ball
cc less than 1 ball
each ornament uses approximately 1/4 ounce other items needed
yarn needle ribbon or thread for hanging previously available from moda dea 1 website 1 http //www modadea com/patterns/wm1012 htm
